#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<algorithm>

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        int c[n];
        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
        cin>>c[i];

        sort(c,c+n);

        int minCost = 0;
        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
        {
            if(c[i] != c[i-1] && c[i] != c[i+1])
            {
                minCost = c[i];
                break;
            }

        }

        cout<<minCost<<endl;
    }
}
